sentences.sentence: This vase has been preserved intact.
sentences.translation: 这个花瓶保存得完好无损。

sentences.sentence: Few buildings survived the war intact.
sentences.translation: 战争之后没几座完好的建筑了。

sentences.sentence: Most of the house remains intact even after two hundred years.
sentences.translation: 虽然过了两百年，这房子的大部分还保持完好。
